overview: "Her blonde hair and peaches-and-cream complexion may remind you of a Midwestern farm girl, but deep down inside Candie Evens has the heart of an insatiable Sunset Strip nympho! And she's got the tantalizingly top-heavy figure to match! Like her name, she can indeed be a sweet and scrumptious treat. But when a well-equipped stud or curvaceous young woman presses the right buttons, volcanic vixen Candie erupts in a steamy show of pure porn passion! Some of Candie's most explosive scenes ever are contained in this blistering collection, filled with red-hot action and plenty of awesome angles of Candie's breathtaking bod. Just give this juicy little number a taste, and you'll never want anything else!"
title: Taste of Candie Evans
